name: Heaven & Hell
description: In the devilish match-3 game Heaven & Hell, you'll have to help the witty angel Angelo bring back the heavenly artifacts stolen by the devil. Solve hundreds great match-3 levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
